column5: Pick up the new to me ride tomorrow 2008 Jeep Liberty, should tow the Stratos just fine!
I hope there is a CRD badge on the back
very nice!  Wife drives one...she loves it!
Nice Wheels bud !!! Nothing will hold you back now
nice wheels - but i like your choice of a Stratos even more.
Congrats on the new wheels Nice choice
they only made them in 05, 06 and that is a 08..do the math..LOL
check and make sure it has a trailer hitch! and check the wiring harness with a test light.
I also drive one. Its never been back for any warranty defects.. the 4wheel is awesome.
Jeep can't go wrong. I have a 95 grand c parked with 370,000 and running and a 2007 Compass great cars.

Ya I hope it works out the reviews seemed mostly positive, got what I believe is a good deal 17k out the door and that includes a brand new set of winter tires on rims and a 3 year gold plan warranty that covers the vehicle from bumper to bumper. There is no hitch on it now but according to dealer it`s a simple and relatively inexpensive add-on,perhaps we`ll get a lift kit put on and some Mickey Thompson`s and go crush some CRV`s and some RAV 4's  Just kidding
I would make sure that you have a heavy duty transmission cooler installed too.  There is more to a tow package then a hitch and wires.  Have a look here Tow info
Congrats Gord! Looks like a beauty......and oh, I'll have to hide  my Rav 4 when I see you coming up the highway! LOL
LOL no worries Brian I love Toyota`s and Honda`s, Toyota and Honda are good customers of mine I did the racking and shelving in the central stores in Alliston and Woodstock!
